game_name: Sea Level Rise Explorer: Long Beach
game_description: This experience was developed to illustrate the potential impacts of climate change on coastal communities and possible solutions. We hope this experience will help support the communityâ€™s conversation about how to adapt to a changing climate. The goal of this project is to start a dialogue to ensure we can implement near-term solutions and plan for a just and smooth transition at the best possible time, minimizing financial and emotional impacts to the Long Beach community.
review_1: The model is GOOD, and the 360 pic demo is also clear with high-res. Thank u sir!
